description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任陕西省民政厅厅长。他是中国共产党中央军事委员会前副主席郭伯雄的胞弟。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former director of the Shaanxi Provincial Department of Civil Affairs. He is the younger brother of Guo Boxiong, former Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中央军事委员会副主席。是郭伯权的胞兄。
description.en: A general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, former member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He is the elder brother of Guo Boquan.

description.zh-cn: 郭伯雄之子，郭伯权的侄子。
description.en: The son of Guo Boxiong and the nephew of Guo Boquan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国陕西省政府负责民政事务的部门。
description.en: The department of the Shaanxi Provincial Government of the People's Republic of China responsible for civil affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国陕西省咸阳市，是郭伯权的出生地。
description.en: A county in Xianyang, Shaanxi Province, China, and the birthplace of Guo Boquan.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国武装力量的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest military leading body of the Communist Party of China and the armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党陕西省委员会
en: Shaanxi Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在陕西省的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Shaanxi Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会
en: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 陕西省老龄工作委员会办公室

zh-cn: 陕西省老龄工作委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 陕西省负责老龄工作的机构。
description.en: The agency responsible for work related to the aging population in Shaanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 陕西省人民政府的咨询机构，郭伯权在被免去民政厅厅长后曾在此任职。
description.en: The advisory body of the Shaanxi Provincial People's Government, where Guo Boquan served after being dismissed as Director of the Department of Civil Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 陕西省的文史研究机构，郭伯权在被免去民政厅厅长后曾在此任职馆长。
description.en: A research institute for culture and history in Shaanxi Province, where Guo Boquan served as director after being dismissed as Director of the Department of Civil Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，郭伯权的前任陕西省文史研究馆馆长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Guo Boquan's predecessor as the Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Institute for Culture and History.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，郭伯权的继任陕西省文史研究馆馆长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Guo Boquan's successor as the Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Institute for Culture and History.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，郭伯权的前任陕西省民政厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Guo Boquan's predecessor as the Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Department of Civil Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，郭伯权的继任陕西省民政厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Guo Boquan's successor as the Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Department of Civil Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 郭伯权是郭伯雄的胞弟。
description.en: Guo Boquan is the younger brother of Guo Boxiong.

description.zh-cn: 郭正钢是郭伯雄的儿子。
description.en: Guo Zhenggang is the son of Guo Boxiong.

description.zh-cn: 郭正钢是郭伯权的侄子。
description.en: Guo Zhenggang is the nephew of Guo Boquan.

description.zh-cn: 郭伯权出生于陕西省礼泉县。
description.en: Guo Boquan was born in Liquan County, Shaanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 郭伯权于1987年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Guo Boquan joined the Communist Party of China in 1987.

relationships.target: 陕西省老龄工作委员会办公室
中国共产党中央军事委员会

relationships.source: 中国共产党陕西省委员会

description.zh-cn: 2015年5月，陕西省委巡视组在对郭伯权任职的陕西省民政厅进行巡视时，发现其存在挪用资金、国有资产损失严重等问题，最终导致郭伯权于同年9月被免去民政厅厅长职务。
description.en: In May 2015, during an inspection of the Shaanxi Provincial Department of Civil Affairs where Guo Boquan was serving, the Shaanxi Provincial Party Committee's inspection team discovered issues such as misappropriation of funds and severe loss of state-owned assets, which ultimately led to Guo Boquan's dismissal as director in September of the same year.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中纪委机关报《中国纪检监察报》于2015年5月29日刊文，指出挪用救灾资金的行为构成挪用特定款物罪，须给予严惩，对郭伯权案的处理施加了舆论压力并推动了其被免职的进程。
description.en: On May 29, 2015, the official newspaper of the CCDI published an article pointing out that the misappropriation of disaster relief funds constitutes a specific crime and must be severely punished, applying public pressure and pushing forward the process of Guo Boquan's dismissal.

description.zh-cn: 郭伯权接替曹莉莉担任陕西省民政厅厅长。
description.en: Guo Boquan succeeded Cao Lili as the Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Department of Civil Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 赵政才接替郭伯权担任陕西省民政厅厅长。
description.en: Zhao Zhengcai succeeded Guo Boquan as the Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Department of Civil Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 郭伯权接替秦向东担任陕西省文史研究馆馆长。
description.en: Guo Boquan succeeded Qin Xiangdong as the Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Institute for Culture and History.

description.zh-cn: 徐晔接替郭伯权担任陕西省文史研究馆馆长。
description.en: Xu Ye succeeded Guo Boquan as the Director of the Shaanxi Provincial Institute for Culture and History.
